q: How are flood barriers designed for multi-unit buildings?
a: Shared systems use continuous base tracks across multiple doors with individual removable panels. Coordination with fire egress and ADA routes is critical. See building-code standards.

q: Do condos need separate permits per unit?
a: Usually one permit covers common-area protection. Individual units add interior measures as needed.

q: How do you manage multiple deployment teams?
a: We create color-coded plans and storage maps so residents deploy their assigned panels efficiently.
